pageTitle: WAVE ENTERTAINMENT PCL (WAVE:Bangkok): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8194=Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited announced consolidated and company earnings results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015. For the quarter, on consolidated basis, the company reported net profit of THB 44,096,000 or THB 1.36 per share compared to net loss of THB 1,617,000 or THB 0.05 per share a year ago.   For the quarter, on company basis, the company reported net loss of THB 1,299,000 or THB 0.04 per share compared to THB 13,891,000 or THB 0.43 per share a year ago., 7414=Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited, Board Meeting, Jun 24, 2015. Agenda: To acquire 86 million shares, 50% of Index Creative Village Public Company Limited issued and paid-up shares capital, from GMM Media Public Company Limited; to enter into the share purchase agreement; and to enter shareholders' agreement with Index Creative Village Public Company., 9043=Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited announced that the Board of Directors' Meeting held on February 26, 2015 resolved to approve the appointment of Mr. Chaipranin Visudhipol as the company's director and independent director in replacement of Mr. Chansak Fuangfu who resigned. This appointment would be effective from 26 February 2015 onward and the term is equal to the remaining term of the resigned director., 4820=Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes television programs and movies in Thailand. It is also involved in the copyright and distribution of Thai drama of Channel 3 in the form of VCDs and DVDs; sub-leasing of spaces in department stores and buildings; operation of concerts and events; operation of English language school business under the trade name of Wall Street English; and sale of food and beverages under the trade name of jeffer steak. The company was formerly known as CVD Entertainment Public Company Limited and changed its name to Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited in April 2009. Wave Entertainment Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.}
